name: flashlight
description: It's a red plastic flashlight. You've had it for as long as you can remember.

itemInteractions.battery: You put one battery into the flashlight. It's still missing one battery.

verbInteractions.Open: You unscrew the cap of the Flashlight. It's missing two batteries.
verbInteractions.Use: You flick the switch on and off, but nothing happens.
verbInteractions.Eat: It won't even fit in your mouth.
verbInteractions.Flip: You flip it over, but nothing happens.
verbInteractions.Examine: It's a red plastic flashlight. You've had it for as long as you can remember.
verbInteractions.Take: You grab the flashlight and push the switch. It isn't working.
verbInteractions.Peel: You'll break it if you try to pull it apart.
